Name: mega-tody-5936
Text: Just tried to cook dinner and somehow managed to set off the smoke alarm instead. Guess I’m a culinary genius in my own smoky way. Someone send help (and maybe takeout).

Comments.Name: lemon-tuna-1492
Comments.Text: Maybe stick to easier meals until you master the basics—sounds like smoke alarm practice isn't part of your cooking plan.

Comments.Name: secret-wallaby-8478
Comments.Text: Is setting off the smoke alarm the real goal here, or is there a hidden message about embracing the chaos of learning?
